title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
itunes:title: The Best of The Dan Patrick Show
description:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Bills/Rams game. He thinks Josh Allen should take a book out of Cam Newton's 2015 book and run the ball more. They discuss Black Sabbath vs. Led Zeppelin, off the heels of Ozzie Osbourne's performance at halftime. And Ryan Fitzpatrick joins us to discuss how he's preparing for his new gig as analyst with Thursday Night Football on Amazon 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
On Today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps last night's Bills/Rams game. He thinks Josh Allen should take a book out of Cam Newton's 2015 book and run the ball more. They discuss Black Sabbath vs. Led Zeppelin, off the heels of Ozzie Osbourne's performance at halftime. And Ryan Fitzpatrick joins us to discuss how he's preparing for his new gig as analyst with Thursday Night Football on Amazon 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
itunes:author: iHeartPodcasts and Dan Patrick Podcast Network
